note:
Retired but still interested, so joining this party. No idea what I'm doing on Mastodon - I may never be entirely sure - but enjoying the rummage.

Still interested in UK health and health policy, medicine, health related social science, ageing, paediatrics/child health and uncertainty.

Plus anything 'health and the Third Sector'. Health awareness sceptic, punchy views on charities misidentifying 'raising awareness' as health promotion when it is really brand recognition and fundraising.
